[{"id":"JT-46353","entityId":"25-1906290","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"46353"},{"name":"summary","value":"Merge stream items from the one user"},{"name":"description","value":"

Merge all items from one person in a row
No collapsing exept description/summary changings
Zeplin: https://zpl.io/2vYNy6j

Don't make any settings, about collapsing, we have only one mode on this time

Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

How item selection should work?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529484479089,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2919033","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov I think we should select every single item. It's important for spent time items because we have actions on them.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529488128367,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2963691","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Don't make any settings, we have only one mode on this time

@Dmitry Gizatov why do you want to remove all settings?
Oldest first and Newest first are about the order and of course shouldn't be removed.
Copy link on stream is about sharing information in a stream.

In case you want to remove Collapse issue option we should show all description changes expanded.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532031794731,"updated":1532032018804,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964051","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov sorry for misleading, I talk only about collapsing.

we should show all description changes expanded.


We shouldn't collapse all changing with the exception of summary and description changing. Because it's too big, and often do not very helpful.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532071901066,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964217","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
We shouldn't collapse all changing with the exception of summary and description changing. Because it's too big, and often do not very helpful

Dmitry Gizatov you still have collapsed items in a stream.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532078134668,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964229","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov it's only for description and summary changes because diff can be very big.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532078325600,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-43813","entityId":"25-1733824","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"43813"},{"name":"summary","value":"Problem with presentation of description and text custom fields changes"},{"name":"description","value":"

The problem with description and text custom fields changes.
For this changes, we show the difference between previous text and new text (what was deleted/added/changed etc.)

Examples:

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1507643225353"},{"name":"updated","value":"1532075666814"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"mitya"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Dmitry Gizatov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"pavel.nikitin"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Pavel Nikitin"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"8"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-731","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"mitya","fullName":"Dmitry Gizatov"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend","Design"],"valueId":["Frontend","Design"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 71","id":"YouTrack:sprint 71"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image.png","id":"74-547099","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image.png?file=74-547099&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2962645","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-43813","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Pavel Nikitin does this problem still exists?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532000482688,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964074","author":"pavel.nikitin","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikitin","issueId":"JT-43813","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Maksim Ryzhikov it is, because history will be expanded to fix the problem of not being to see the changes.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532072837142,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964086","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-43813","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532073538721,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964094","author":"pavel.nikitin","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikitin","issueId":"JT-43813","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

No, if each description/markdown field edit will be a separate item in the merged feed

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532073819816,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964118","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-43813","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Pavel Nikitin I see, So this issue about the presentation of changes inside description, and text custom fields in history items?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532074426319,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964121","author":"pavel.nikitin","authorFullName":"Pavel Nikitin","issueId":"JT-43813","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

I believe so

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532074607937,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964135","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-43813","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532075285960,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964143","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-43813","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Pavel Nikitin do we have a description of how it works now?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532075666815,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-46057","entityId":"25-1881434","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"46057"},{"name":"summary","value":"New UI: "Load more" is irritating for issues with many comments"},{"name":"description","value":"
Recently YouTrack has changed how comment paging works. Before the change I was able to quickly access last comments, read them, and reply. Now I have to click "Load more" until I finally access the desired comment. More over, the issue doesn't remember I clicked "Load more" several times, and next time I visit this page I will clicking again. Could you please fix such behavior and provide quick access to last comments as old YouTrack had?

Demo issue https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/JRE-526
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1519987891543"},{"name":"updated","value":"1532072345937"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"kb"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Konstantin Bulenkov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"4"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-46387","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"JT-45884","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-731","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"xi-eye","fullName":"Alexander Anisimov"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Major"],"valueId":["Major"],"color":{"bg":"#ffee9c","fg":"#b45f06"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 71","id":"YouTrack:sprint 71"}]},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"image1520263567002.png","id":"74-499285","url":"https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/_persistent/image1520263567002.png?file=74-499285&c=true"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2731102","author":"mazine","authorFullName":"Maxim Mazin","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Dmitry Gizatov, @Maksim Ryzhikov, @Alexander Anisimov: I guess in «oldest first» mode "load more" should be on the top and should load older comments.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520263498436,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2731107","author":"mazine","authorFullName":"Maxim Mazin","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Konstantin Bulenkov Please try ‘Newest first’ mode. It's not a complete solution for this issue but a sort of workaround that can help you.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1520263574232,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2963760","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Pavel Nikolaev can we do here the same as on MPS UI? Show the last 100 items?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532041574757,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"youtrack-developers","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2964066","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-46057","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov I think it relates to the issue JT-46387
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1532072345970,"updated":1532072460565,"permittedGroup":"youtrack-developers","markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-48288","entityId":"25-2051260","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48288"},{"name":"summary","value":"Merge duplicated events on client side"},{"name":"description","value":"

In YTB-422 there is 2 events for linking this issue with another one. This can be reproduced locally with debugging backend.

Since fix this events on the backend is extremely expensive. We decided:

1 In separated history-changes no need to show previews. Only for history that attached to comment
2 No need to show preview for deleted attachments
3 Added attachment need to show on the next line after title "Attachments"
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1511527025336,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2548941","author":"xi-eye","authorFullName":"Alexander Anisimov","issueId":"JT-44578","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

1 In separated history-changes no need to show previews. Only for history that attached to comment

@Artem Tiunov do you mean not to show added attachments at all or show just a name of an attachment? In any case we should show something.

3 Added attachment need to show on the next line after title "Attachments"

you've said that it's not necessary to show label "Attachments" if only one attachment was added

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1511626424927,"updated":1511626447597,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2550512","author":"artemtiunov","authorFullName":"Artem Tiunov","issueId":"JT-44578","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
show just a name of an attachment

Alexander Anisimov 1. yap

3. Sorry, I mean preview of added attachment.

{"id":"JT-47780","entityId":"25-2026938","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47780"},{"name":"summary","value":"Show diff details in a history view is not shown in case it's the first item with the following expand control [...]"},{"name":"description","value":"
If the history item contains ...(triple dot) button and i click on Details - they are not expanding.
For example try to expand details of first history item on this issue DTRC-25281

STR:

  1. Open new FSI with changes (it should contains Summary changed: Details and show more changes button)
  2. Expand Details
    AR: nothing will happen (there is no details).
    N.B. click on "show more changes button" and then click on Details -- it works

@Alexey Korovin
Thank you for the bug,
temporary workaround: click on show more changes button (triple dot) and then expand Details
